transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Lancement Maj Affectation} as string,
		{Diffus/Chantier} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refaffectation
source(output(
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		DR as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		NomATC2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ref2021
Select2 derive(Utilisateur = lower(Utilisateur)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 derive(NomATC = lower(NomATC)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR,
		{ID SAP},
		{Diffus/Chantier}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		DR,
		{Secteur prime},
		Matricule,
		{Secteur DEC},
		Rallye
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select3 filter(!isNull(NomATC)) ~> Filter1
filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation derive({Plan prime} = iif( Fonction== "Attaché commercial réseau" || Fonction == "Attaché commercial réseau 2" , "Diffus", iif( Fonction == "Attaché commercial prescription"  , "Chantier", ""  )  )) ~> DerivedColumn3
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR,
		{ID SAP},
		{Diffus/Chantier}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		ATC,
		{Plan primes},
		DR,
		{Secteur prime},
		Matricule,
		{Secteur DEC},
		Rallye,
		NomATC = NomATC_new
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
ref2021 derive(NomATC_oring = toString(byName('NomATC1')),
		NomATC_new = toString(byName('NomATC8'))) ~> MapDrifted1
refaffectation filter(in(['Attaché commercial prescription','Attaché commercial réseau 2','Attaché commercial prescription'], Fonction)) ~> Filter2
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['atc_affectation_lower.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> atcAffectationLower
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['atc_c2021_lower.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> atcC2021Lower
